column4: Not so sure this is an ubuntu question, probably my router/DHCP server... But this box's name is xubuntu-test02, yet the DHCP server seems to think it is using a name it had a couple of HD's and OSs ago, that another machine currently has, any idea how to fix this without resetting whichever bit of hardware is the DHCP server?
I don't what the big deal with this is
I don't know what the big deal is
it's probably a problem with your router, try resetting it
